column5: SENIORS/FAMILIES ONLY . Second floor,elevator-La Isla boasts beautifully landscaped grounds and plenty of spacious parking. Wi-fi internet access is available throughout the private clubhouse with spacious roof-top sun deck and pool area. Two resort style swimming pools - One family oriented pool with wading area for the children and playground nearby and other adult pool with fire pits and two hot tubs, Both with plentiful lounge chairs and cabanas, picnic and outdoor grilling areas.
column8: La Isla #201 Mid-island next to Schliterbahn wtrpk
